original_title: นิราศกรุงเกลือ
overview: Sathaporn, a liturature teacher, is joined by the bond and needs to accept the truth that Sirinarth, his pregnant wife, cannot have sex as much as he desires. What will happen if he decides to leave his lover behind, escape his old life and accidentally find the path to Krungkluea, a heaven in the liturature, which becomes realistic during his journey.
title: Krungkluea
